about: Ever since I discovered Flash at the age of 14, I have been passionate about designing and developing websites. In 2017, I turned my dream into a career, working as a full stack developer with a strong focus on the frontend. Excellent user experience, modern technologies, and clean, maintainable UI design are particularly important to me. I'm just in love with smooth, intuitive looks and feels.
